Using the ME2000 Sequencer Plugin

The Mobileer Instrument Editor can be used as a VST Instrument plugin on Windows or an AU Instrument plugin on Macintosh. This allows you to use the ME2000 instruments with your favorite composition tool and edit them at the same time.

Using the Plugin

  1. Launch your favorite sequencer and assign the VST instrument or AU instrument to a track. You will need to read the documentation for your sequencer to learn how to do this.
  2. In the Mobileer Editor, select "Remote" from the "Synth" menu. The instrument status bar should now say "Synth: remote".

Downloading Instruments to the Plugin

  1. You will need to download the instrument definitions from the editor to the remote plugin. You can press the "Hear" button in the Orchestra editor next to each instrument. That will cause it to be downloaded to the plugin and played.
  2. Or you can hit the "Update Synth" button in the toolbar. That will cause all of the instruments to be downloaded and may take a minute or two.

Finishing Up

  1. When you are done using the sequencer, you can switch back to the normal mode by selecting "Local" from the Synth menu.
